fileSamples.statement:
⦗F ∩₁ Sc⦘ ⨾ s_hb ⨾ eco ⨾ s_hb ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Sc⦘
⊆ ⦗F ∩₁ Sc⦘ ⨾ hb ⨾ eco ⨾ hb ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Sc⦘.
fileSamples.proofString: by rewrite s_hb_in_hb.

fileSamples.statement:
⦗R⦘
⨾ (bob ∪ s_ppo ∪ detour ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex⦘ ⨾ rfi ⨾ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘)⁺
  ⨾ ⦗W⦘
⊆ ⦗R⦘
  ⨾ (bob ∪ ppo ∪ detour ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex⦘ ⨾ rfi ⨾ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘)⁺
    ⨾ ⦗W⦘.
fileSamples.proofString: by rewrite s_ppo_in_ppo.

fileSamples.statement: (AC : acyclic ar) : acyclic (s_ar (⦗F ∩₁ Sc⦘ ⨾ s_hb ⨾ eco ⨾ s_hb ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Sc⦘)).
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold imm_s.ar.
apply s_acyc_ext_psc_helper; auto.
unfold imm_s.psc.
rewrite s_psc_in_psc.
rewrite s_ar_int_in_ar_int.
arewrite (sb^? ⨾ psc ⨾ sb^? ⊆ ar⁺).
rewrite imm.wf_pscD.
rewrite !seqA.
arewrite (sb^? ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Sc⦘ ⊆ bob^?).
unfold imm_bob.bob, imm_bob.fwbob.
mode_solver 10.
arewrite (⦗F ∩₁ Sc⦘ ⨾ sb^?⊆ bob^?).
unfold imm_bob.bob, imm_bob.fwbob.
mode_solver 10.
arewrite (bob ⊆ ar).
unfold imm.ar, imm_ppo.ar_int.
basic_solver 10.
arewrite (psc ⊆ ar).
rewrite ct_step with (r:=ar) at 2.
by rewrite ct_cr, cr_ct.
arewrite (rfe ⊆ ar).
arewrite (ar_int ⊆ ar).
arewrite (⦗R⦘ ⨾ ar⁺ ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ ar⁺) by basic_solver.
rewrite ct_step with (r:=ar) at 2.
sin_rewrite !unionK.
red.
by rewrite ct_of_ct.

fileSamples.statement: (AC : acyclic ar) : acyclic (⦗F ∩₁ Sc⦘ ⨾ s_hb ⨾ eco ⨾ s_hb ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Sc⦘ ∪ rfe ∪ s_ar_int).

rewrite !seqA.
arewrite (sb^? ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Sc⦘ ⊆ bob^?).
unfold imm_bob.bob, imm_bob.fwbob.
mode_solver 10.
arewrite (⦗F ∩₁ Sc⦘ ⨾ sb^?⊆ bob^?).
unfold imm_bob.bob, imm_bob.fwbob.
mode_solver 10.
arewrite (bob ⊆ ar).
unfold imm.ar, imm_ppo.ar_int.
basic_solver 10.
arewrite (psc ⊆ ar).
rewrite ct_step with (r:=ar) at 2.
by rewrite ct_cr, cr_ct.

rewrite ct_step with (r:=ar) at 2.
sin_rewrite !unionK.
red.
by rewrite ct_of_ct.

red.

fileSamples.statement:

⊆ (sb ⨾ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘ ∪ ⦗W ∩₁ Rel⦘ ⨾ sb ∩ same_loc ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ sb ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘
   ∪ ⦗F ∩₁ Acq/Rel⦘ ⨾ sb ∪ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘ ⨾ sb)^?.
fileSamples.proofString: mode_solver 10.

unfold imm.ar, imm_ppo.ar_int.

arewrite (psc ⊆ ar).
rewrite ct_step with (r:=ar) at 2.
by rewrite ct_cr, cr_ct.

basic_solver 10.

fileSamples.statement:
(AC : acyclic ar) : bob
⊆ psc ∪ rfe
  ∪ (bob ∪ ppo ∪ detour ∪ ⦗W_ex_acq⦘ ⨾ sb ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ∪ ⦗W_ex⦘ ⨾ rfi ⨾ ⦗R ∩₁ Acq⦘).
fileSamples.proofString: basic_solver 10.

arewrite (psc ⊆ ar).
rewrite ct_step with (r:=ar) at 2.
by rewrite ct_cr, cr_ct.

fileSamples.statement: (AC : acyclic ar) : ar^? ⨾ ar⁺ ⨾ ar^? ⊆ ar⁺.

fileSamples.statement: (AC : acyclic ar) : acyclic (ar⁺ ∪ rfe ∪ ⦗R⦘ ⨾ ar_int⁺ ⨾ ⦗W⦘).
fileSamples.proofString:
arewrite (rfe ⊆ ar).
arewrite (ar_int ⊆ ar).
arewrite (⦗R⦘ ⨾ ar⁺ ⨾ ⦗W⦘ ⊆ ar⁺) by basic_solver.
rewrite ct_step with (r:=ar) at 2.
sin_rewrite !unionK.
red.
by rewrite ct_of_ct.

red.

fileSamples.statement: (AC : acyclic ar) : acyclic ar⁺.
fileSamples.proofString:
red.
by rewrite ct_of_ct.

fileSamples.statement: (AC : acyclic ar) : irreflexive (ar⁺)⁺.
fileSamples.proofString: by rewrite ct_of_ct.

fileSamples.statement: (IC : imm.imm_consistent G) : imm.acyc_ext G.
fileSamples.proofString: apply IC.

fileSamples.statement: (IC : imm.imm_consistent G) (sc : relation actid) (H : imm_consistent G sc) : exists sc0 : relation actid, imm_psc_consistent G sc0.
fileSamples.proofString:
exists sc.
red.
splits; auto.
unfold psc_f, psc_base, scb.
rewrite s_hb_in_hb.
apply IC.

fileSamples.statement: (IC : imm.imm_consistent G) (sc : relation actid) (H : imm_consistent G sc) : imm_psc_consistent G sc.
fileSamples.proofString:
red.
splits; auto.
unfold psc_f, psc_base, scb.
rewrite s_hb_in_hb.
apply IC.

fileSamples.statement: (IC : imm.imm_consistent G) (sc : relation actid) (H : imm_consistent G sc) : acyclic (psc_f G ∪ psc_base G).
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold psc_f, psc_base, scb.
rewrite s_hb_in_hb.
apply IC.

fileSamples.statement:
(IC : imm.imm_consistent G) (sc : relation actid) (H : imm_consistent G sc) : acyclic
  (⦗F ∩₁ Sc⦘ ⨾ s_hb ⨾ (eco ⨾ s_hb)^? ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Sc⦘
   ∪ ⦗Sc⦘
     ⨾ (⦗F⦘ ⨾ s_hb)^?
       ⨾ (sb ∪ (sb \ same_loc) ⨾ s_hb ⨾ (sb \ same_loc) ∪ s_hb ∩ same_loc
          ∪ co ∪ fr) ⨾ (s_hb ⨾ ⦗F⦘)^? ⨾ ⦗Sc⦘).
fileSamples.proofString:
rewrite s_hb_in_hb.
apply IC.

fileSamples.statement:
(IC : imm.imm_consistent G) (sc : relation actid) (H : imm_consistent G sc) : acyclic
  (⦗F ∩₁ Sc⦘ ⨾ hb ⨾ (eco ⨾ hb)^? ⨾ ⦗F ∩₁ Sc⦘
   ∪ ⦗Sc⦘
     ⨾ (⦗F⦘ ⨾ hb)^?
       ⨾ (sb ∪ (sb \ same_loc) ⨾ hb ⨾ (sb \ same_loc) ∪ hb ∩ same_loc ∪ co
          ∪ fr) ⨾ (hb ⨾ ⦗F⦘)^? ⨾ ⦗Sc⦘).
fileSamples.proofString: apply IC.
